name: Selfie
summary: Eliza Dooley已经受够了初中时期的怪异呆子形象了。感谢神奇的镭射脱毛技术、效果拔群的调整型内衣和万能的修图软件。她已摇身一变成为自拍女王，在instagram和推特上有263,000关注者。她不知廉耻的在推特上讲述自己被迫坐轮椅穿过机场，因为踩着5英寸高的红底鞋（Christian Louboutin）算是一种残疾。她无休止的自拍和评论，使她主页点击率和点赞数节节上升。 当她在飞机上出丑的照片疯传之后，她发现网络上的加好友和现实上的交朋友是两回事。所以她想聘请了沉默寡言但资深的营销公关Henry，去重新塑造她的形象，来恢复她的名声。作为回报，Eliza挑逗性地说可以为Henry“做”任何事情。不过Henry拒绝了“做”那些事情，并表示两人关系仅限工作。 不过Henry还是偷偷给Eliza考验。不过第一项考验就没通过，Eliza在婚礼上竟然开着声音玩Candy Crush。Eliza辩解说听到那些海誓山盟让她觉得很不舒服，只想逃离一切。Henry因为她藐视他所定下的规矩而不干下去了。不过，Eliza还是使用她那独特的魅力使Henry回心转意，再给了她一次机会。况且，他俩之间的火花，连周边的人都发现了。整个故事基于永远的女神赫本的《窈窕淑女 My Fair Lady》的现代改编版本。Henry致力让Eliza的生活远离网络，但是Eliza还是沉迷在网络的点赞生活
info:
• 中文名: 再造淑女
  • 集数: 13
  • 开始: 2014-09-30
  • 结束: 2014-12-23

eps.name: Pilot
eps.desc: A narcissistic pharmaceutical sales representative seeks help from a successful marketing rep after discovering that her social media popularity does not translate into offline friendship.

eps.name: Un-Tag My Heart
eps.desc: Taking advice from one another, Eliza attempts to obtain a hobby other than casual sex, while Henry creates a Facebook account.

eps.name: With A Little Yelp From My Friends
eps.desc: Saperstein orders his employees to work on their interpersonal connectivity, leading Henry and Eliza to the realization that their most valuable office relationship is with each other.

eps.name: Nugget of Wisdom
eps.desc: Henry challenges Eliza to help others, so she offers to babysit Charmonique's young son, Kevin, who, in turn, teaches her about having more fun.

eps.name: Even Hell Has Two Bars
eps.desc: Eliza and Henry engage in some questionable behavior while spending the weekend with no cell reception at the estate of their boss Sam Saperstein, who dangles a promotion in both of their faces.

eps.name: Never Block Cookies
eps.desc: Eliza attributes Henry's perpetual bad mood to his lack of a love life and makes it her mission to help him out with the ladies, whether he wants her to or not.
